definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging and clinical features of optic-hypothalamic gliomas.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究下視丘膠質瘤的影像表現及臨牀發病特徵。

sentences.english: Disorders of the hypothalamus are one cause of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 下視丘的病變也會造成尿崩症。
